Notes: blending of symbol face color (0.0 transparent through 1.0 opaque). (Default : 1.0)
dictionary with two possible colors keys ('ticks', 'tick_labels') or None, if None then considers only the value of 'circlecolor' (Default: None)
radii of circles to draw to indicate isopleths of standard deviation (empty by default)
data values to use for color mapping of markers, e.g. RMSD or BIAS. (Default empty)
on'/'off' switch to map color shading of markers to CMapZData values ('on') or min to max range of CMapZData values ('off'). (Default : 'on')
on'/'off' switch to set axes to be equal (Default 'on')
single color to use for all markers (Default: red)
markers to use for individual experiments
name of the experiment to use for marker
on'/'off' switch to display marker legend (Default 'off')
marker to use for x-axis indicating observed STD. A choice of 'none' will suppress appearance of marker. (Default 'none')
statistics supplied are normalized with respect to the standard deviation of reference values (Default 'off')
on'/'off' switch to overlay current statistics on target diagram (Default 'off'). Only markers will be displayed.
define tick positions (default is that used by the axis function)
position of the tick labels along the x-axis (empty by default)
position of the tick labels along the y-axis (empty by default)
